Name: A Commission
Description: The Severe Chemist glares at you over his glasses. "Beneath the zee, captain, there is a city of murderers. Within it, a plant known as tether. Bring me a jarful and I will pay you handsomely."

DefaultEvent.Description: He smiles in the manner of a corpse whose skin has just dried out. "Excellent. You'll find it in Wrack, City of Pleasures. I'll be waiting for you on the Uttershroom, where my studies continue."

ChildBranches.Name: Accept the task
ChildBranches.Description: You'll get him a jarful of tether, no trouble.

DefaultEvent.Description: You decline and go about your business. "If not this time, then another," he says behind your back. What an odd man.

ChildBranches.Name: Walk away
ChildBranches.Description: Go into a city of murderers on account of a weed? Doesn't he know people don't come back from deaths at Zee?
